title: Exercise 3.6: Wave speeds
description: Implement compute_wave_speeds(k, mu, rho) returning (Vp, Vs) with Vp=sqrt((k+4*mu/3)/rho) and Vs=sqrt(mu/rho), raising ValueError for non-physical inputs.
hints: Use math.sqrt for the square roots.
Inputs k, mu, rho must be positive; density cannot be negative or zero.
